title: Gym Starter Pack
description: 3-month gym pass. Basic gym kit for beginners. Includes essential accessories and a starter workout guide.

title: Strength Training Set
description: 3-month strength training pass with a 2-week free trial. Weighted training equipment set for strength workouts and progressive resistance training.

title: Cardio Essentials
description: 3-month gym pass. High-energy cardio accessories and wearable gear to boost endurance sessions.
